mapper.insert: insert into order_info (machine_ip, order_no, request_amount, timeout_date, pay_type, merchant_order_no, merchant_fee, merchant_rate, merchant_no, merchant_name, remark, notice_web, notice_sys, order_type) values(#{machineIp}, #{orderNo}, #{requestAmount}, #{timeoutDate}, #{payType}, #{merchantOrderNo}, #{merchantFee}, #{merchantRate}, #{merchantNo}, #{merchantName}, #{remark}, #{noticeWeb}, #{noticeSys}, #{orderType})
mapper.update: update order_info set order_status = #{orderStatus},version = version +1,complete_date = now(),pay_no = #{payNo} where order_no = #{orderNo} and order_status < 200 and version = #{version}
